burgers.name: Wasab’ Wellington?
burgers.description: Teriyaki-marinated beef patty, wasabi mayo coleslaw, cucumber, daikon and cheese sauce in a toasted milk bun, with Agria fries

burgers.name: Gemma Lily Vegan Burger
burgers.description: Housesmoked tofu, grilled flat brown mushroom, pickled cabbage and roasted red capsicum in a sesame bun

burgers.name: Loco Chicken Burger
burgers.description: Fried chicken with chipotle slaw, housemade mango chutney in a corn and chilli bun, with patatas bravas

burgers.name: The El Fidelito Waffler
burgers.description: Creole fried chicken with BBQ corn salsa, pickled red onions, cheddar, Fix & Fogg Smoke & Fire sauce and housemade ranch, served in between waffles and gravy on the side

burgers.name: Henneything is Possible
burgers.description: Hennessy-marinated beef brisket patty with jalapeño cheese, Hennessy bacon jam and pickles in a housebaked gold leaf-flaked potato bun, with fries

burgers.name: Piggy McPigface
burgers.description: Beef patty with Sriracha-candied bacon, bacon marmalade, bacon and pickle aioli and feta whip in a Pandoro bacon bun, with fries

burgers.name: Beery Had a Lotta Lamb
burgers.description: Heyday beer-braised Wairarapa lamb shoulder, with rocket, berry compote and minted aioli in an Arobake milk bun, with roast potatoes and Heyday gravy

burgers.name: Eye of the Tiger
burgers.description: Trang Province-inspired Pirinoa beef patty with feisty Thai spices, in a Zaida's Bakery bun, with trimmings

burgers.name: Wagyu Marrow Me
burgers.description: Wagyu and smoked bone marrow patty with aged cheddar, onion rings and prosciutto in a Pandoro bun, with handcut fries

burgers.name: The Sip and Dip
burgers.description: Chargrilled beef patty, streaky bacon, Kingsmeade Riversdale pecorino and buttermilk fried courgette in a potato bun, with onion dip

burgers.name: Mighty Ducks
burgers.description: Pulled duck with crispy skin and pâté, giardiniera pickles, endive and saffron aioli in a housemade Italian milk bun, with duck fat fries

burgers.name: The E.M. Hemingway
burgers.description: Pork, beef and bacon burger with crispy hazelnut slaw, pickled onion rings and smoked tomato sauce, with bacon-dusted fries and gravy

burgers.name: The Cheesy Italian
burgers.description: Beef patty with air-cured bresaola, Ubriaco Rosso formaggi, lettuce and tomato on a Pandoro ciabatta bun with steak fries

burgers.name: Do or Doughnut
burgers.description: Beef patty, coffee and Huffman's chilli aioli with Prodigal Daughter bacon, pickles and cheese in a glazed doughnut bun, with horopito fries

burgers.name: Brewed to the Bone
burgers.description: Smoked beef short rib with candied bacon and Zany Zeus boozy cheese sauce in an Arobake bun, with curly fries
